Name: Freetown
Description: Freetown is the capital and largest city of Sierra Leone, known for its historic significance, coastal beaches, and vibrant culture.

Name: Bo
Description: Bo is the second-largest city in Sierra Leone, located in the southern part of the country, and serves as a key administrative and commercial hub.

Name: Kenema
Description: Kenema is an important town in eastern Sierra Leone, known for its mining industry, particularly diamonds, and as a gateway to the southern region.
